This book is banned in several Arab countries to the great writer Louis Awad, Introduction to the jurisprudence of the Arabic language by Louis Awad (Arabic)


This book by Louis Awad is still banned in Egypt since 1981 until now. This book reflects the great problem for both researcher and the recipient, for many reasons and is the first research dealt with the thorny on the origin and attributed the Arab nation, including the arabic language and it confirms that the nation is relatively new compared with the adjacent nations. 

We wish you an enjoyable read.
